release.action: Because no contact to the author of onejar-maven-plugin (Drew Stovall) via mail (onejar-maven-plugin@dstovall.org) was established, so i have renamed the project to 1jar-maven-plugin. This was done to avoid trouble with identical version of my code with the code of the original author (Drew Stovall). I would like to merge the different versions for the future. The author could contact me via mail to development@thomas-michel.info.
New parameter policyFile. This parameter is sometimes needed for usage in web start applications.
After creation of one-jar.jar file, this will be added to the list of artifacts. So other plugins, such as pgp plugin could find the artifact.
The dependencies wiht scope runtime are now supported to add as libraries. This was needed for libraries such as ICE_JNIRegistry-1.dll.
Contributing code to simplify the manifest manipulations and adding the Implementation Version manifest entry key.
Out of Memory Error was resolved.
Contributing code to allow the plugin to operate without an exectuable jar. (ie the mainClass configuration parameter)
